SEARCH

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
FirstValidAI, HighestValueAI, Human, LowestValueAI
public class Player extends Object
This is the Player class within the UNO game which represents a player on the UNO game. Each player has a hand compromised of cards they must play during the game.
Author:
Brian Tran 101231003
